title: Sold - T206 SC 150/30 Walter Johnson Portrait SGC 4
author: DeanH3

posts.post_title: Sold - T206 SC 150/30 Walter Johnson Portrait SGC 4
posts.post_content:
Beautiful card. Registration is spot on. Nicely centered with full borders. Tobacco spot on top reverse. Line towards the bottom is not a mark. Looks like more of a slight surface abrasion of some sort.

$4,800 net shipped/insured registered mail.

Thanks for looking.

One price redux before heading to consignment. Thanks for looking.

$4,800 net delivered registered mail.
